title: The Lady Killigrew
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Western, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Located in the quaint Montague Bookmill in a former grist mill in Montague, this bar and cafe overlooks the gentle fall of the Sawmill River. Offers sandwiches, salads, hot drinks and beer & wine, and sources local products and many that are organic. Vegans can order the tofu sandwich on (sourdough bread with peanut sauce and sauerkraut), the warm brown rice salad, and the peanut noodles. Try the maple balsamic salad dressing.
